title: mxfwzzwizqbz
author: mxfwzzwizqbz
content: Who is the owner of this bitcoin forum? Did Satoshi make this forum or was it a follower of his? Is there a reason why the website layout is "retro" and has stayed the same since the early 2010s? Not saying the layout is bad or anything I kinda like it ngl, it is a little bright though haha

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: The forum is created by satoshi and later, handed over to theymos. Now, it's owned by theymos, it's theymos's forum. The new forum software is in development mode for a quite long time and there's no certain time when we will have the new forum.

Not saying the layout is bad or anything I kinda like it ngl, it is a little bright though hahaÂ  The design of the forum is the default layout of the Simple Machines forum software, the software which the forum is based on. It has not been changed ever since the forum was established. I don't think it ever will be changed, even when the new forum software is done (I believe from what I have read that the two will run hand in hand/alongside each other, I could be wrong about this though).
